GlooKit.GlooAPI

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • GlooKit.GlooAPI.Vertex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultVertex

    public abstract class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract Vertex class represents a vertex type of object that can be implemented. A Vertex, at its core, is merely an array of floats see "Game.Batches.UserVertex" for an example of implementation Author: Eli Jergensen Documenter: Eli Jergensen
